name: Average The Poseidon Adventure Quiz | 10 Questions | Movies

questions.text: Who wrote the novel that the movie was based on?
questions.explanation:
Paul Gallico.

	Irwin Allen produced it and went as an uncredited director.

questions.text: Who was the only actor or actress to be nominated for an Academy Award for their role?
questions.explanation:
Shelly Winters.

	Shelly Winters was nominated for Best Supporting Actress but lost to Eileen Heckart for 'Butterflies Are Free'.

questions.text: Who played the Captain of the ship?
'The Poseidon Adventure' won two Academy Awards, one was for Special Achievement for Visual Effects and the other was for Best Song (The Morning After), Who had the hit with 'The Morning After'?
Which ship was used for some of the interior shots?
questions.explanation:
Queen Mary.

	The Queen Mary was used since it's docked in Long Beach, California.

questions.text: Which of these characters did not survive?
questions.explanation:
Reverend Frank Scott (Gene Hackman).

	He gave up his own life to save the others, when trying to shut the steam valve.

questions.text: How many people survive (assuming that nobody else survived that the movie did not show)?
questions.explanation:
6.

	The characters that survived were played by Ernest Borgnine, Eric Shea, Pamela Sue Martin, Red Buttons, Carol Lynley, and Jack Albertson.
